input.sentences: i have always wanted to ride a ferris wheel .
i got the opportunity this spring to finally go on one .
as i looked up i got a bit fearful .
in my mind i thought i was going to get dizzy like i was on a fast ride .
it felt like i was on a ride that kept spinning and spinning .
output.sentences: I wanted to ride the Ferris wheel to see the views.
I finally had the opportunity when Spring came.
Even though I was a bit fearful, it looked fun.
My children did not mind going on the carousel, but they wnated to ride a fast circular ride.
I didn't go on as I don't like a fast spinning ride.
